appSelection.helperText: Вы так же можете вставить ссылки или App ID и мы попытаемся найти его
appSelection.notFound: Could not  найти game with App ID {{query}}. This can happen если его is either inaccurate или если его has: been removed from the Steam store, not listed as a 'game', или not available in your country.
appSelection.placeholder: Enter name of a game in your Steam library...
appSelection.previousReportsExist: Вы have previous reports for this game
appSelection.runsNativeWarning: The selected game has published a native Linux version! Please be sure Вы have not inadvertently run the game natively. Steam does not use Steam Play run this game by default, but [Вы can force его do so]({{link}}).

audioFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience any problems with audio?

borked.headline: That's a bummer!
borked.intro: Вы will now proceed with submitting a borked report, but before Вы do Вы may want visit our [Game Troubleshooting FAQ]({{link}}) page.

additionalNotes.label: Further Details
additionalNotes.placeholder: Explanation или link blog post или Github repository

duration.prompt: For how long have Вы played?

extra.prompt: Is there anything you'd like add that was not covered in previous questions?

graphicalFaults.prompt: Did Вы notice any graphical degradations?

unsure.long: Whatever the game uses by default

graphicsApiSelection.prompt: What graphics API did Вы use within the game?

controllerNotResponsive.long: Controller(s) detected but were not responsive

inputFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience any problems with your mouse, gamepad или other input devices?

installs.prompt: Were Вы able install the game?

isImpactedByAntiCheat.prompt: Is the game impacted by anti-cheat software?

isMultiplayerImportant.prompt: Is multiplayer a crucial part of the value of this game?

launchFlagsUsed.prompt: Do Вы use any of these Proton launch flags?

launcher.prompt: How do Вы launch the game?

localMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would Вы rate the local multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity или input issues, etc.

localMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did Вы try play multiplayer locally (offline i.e. couch play)?

localMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were Вы able get local multiplayer work?

acceptable.long: Acceptable. Moderate issues but can be struggled through.

excellent.long: Excellent. Did not experience any problems.

good.long: Good. Had infrequent issues but is overall playable.

weak.long: Weak. егоs problems significantly impact the experience

onlineMultiplayerAppraisal.prompt: How would Вы rate the online multiplayer functionality? Please evaulate for lag, connectivity или input issues, matchingmaking failures etc.

onlineMultiplayerAttempted.prompt: Did Вы try play multiplayer online?

onlineMultiplayerPlayed.prompt: Were Вы able connect и play online multiplayer?

opens.prompt: Were Вы able start up the game и view егоs initial menu?

performanceFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience unexpected slowness given your hardware?

prerequisites.invalidOrMissingSystemInfo: System information is missing или invalid

prerequisitesBlock.context: You'll need log into Steam и provide system information before submitting!
prerequisitesBlock.headline: Not Ready Yet!

notes: Is your system information up date? Вы will need go your profile и provide your Steam information after a graphics driver update.
Have Вы selected the correct game? Some games have the same name as older versions i.e. GRID
Have Вы added descriptions in the right place? For example, write notes about graphics issues in that section rather than end notes.

prompts.continuingDraft: Вы are continuing from automatically saved draft.
prompts.discardDraftWarning: All of your responses will be permanently discarded.

additionalNotes.label: Manual Proton Version
additionalNotes.placeholder: Must be valid Proton version string. Examples: {{examples}}

protonVersion.prompt: What version of Proton are Вы using?

errorLoading.long: Could not load a save game

saveGameFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience any problems with save games?

significantBugs.prompt: Did Вы experience any other significant bugs?

stabilityFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience any stability issues?

intro: ProtonDB now buckets reports into two types: Steam Play и Tinker.
Use Steam Play Report cover the out-of-the-box experience. Install, hit play, и get your game on.
Use Tinker Report если Вы have made tweaks или customizations get the game working.
For more on the differences, see [this news post]({{link}}).
type.prompt: What type of report will Вы write?

additionalNotes.label: Summary (max {{count}} chars)
additionalNotes.placeholder: Add a short summary. This will be the headline of your report.

verdict.prompt: Would a typical gamer have enjoyable experience running this game on Linux with Proton?

welcome.headline: Welcome
welcome.intro: Thanks for your interest in expanding ProtonDB's catalog of compatibility reports on Steam Play и Proton! Please keep in mind the following before Вы contribute
notes: Reports are published on ProtonDB help you, Valve, и developers help fix games. Please keep your reports accurate, free of offensive language, и refrain from submitting reports just promote your favorite game, distro или graphics card.

Submitting multiple reports for the same game is encouraged! As Вы play more или update Proton you'll have more say. In this way ProtonDB differs from a wiki, since each report serves as a 'snapshot' of how the game played on that date with your configuration.
If Вы submit multiple reports, only your most recent will count towards the ProtonDB rating и only если your system information meets Proton's minimum requirements.
Your contributions will be publicly visible on ProtonDB и available in data exports under the Open Database License. Go [here]({{link}}) for more information.

switching.long: Could not conventionally escape from fullscreen (such as with Alt-Tab)

windowingFaults.prompt: Did Вы experience any problems with windowing или fullscreen?
